column1: paula ray mills| paula ray (greene) mills passed away sunday
column4: at the age of 70. graveside services were held at willow cemetery at 2:00 p. m.
column7: 2015 under the direction of smith family funeral homes. visitation took place wednesday
column9: 2015 12:00 to 2:00 p. m. located at 304 n. 2nd street
column12: texas. she grew up in irby community and was a resident of haskell most of her life. she married johnny mills in haskell
column13: texas in august 1962. she enjoyed sewing
column15: and knowing what was going on in the community. she loved to go to the beaty shop and visiting with people. she was preceded in death by her parents; howell and christine (hall) greene; her husband
column17: wesley craig mills. paula is survived by her two sons
column18: john mills and wife christy of keller
column19: texas; and corye mills and wife stacey of katy
column23: cardin and tyler mills; two sisters
column28: nephews and cousins. online condolences can be shared with paulas family at www. smithfamilyfh. com.
